long_description: The 3-season, 3-person Origami 3 Tarp from Sierra Designs fills every niche, from a full-coverage backpacking shelter in the wilderness to an airy sunshade at the beach. Distinctive design joins 5 equilateral triangles to create a strong, versatile and reliable shelter. DAC Pressfit(R) telescoping pole lets you pitch the Origami taller for more headroom or lower for wider coverage. Each corner can be staked down for more coverage or tied up to allow easy access or more ventilation. Multiple guyout and stake-out points help the Origami tarp withstand gusty winds and adapt to changing weather conditions. Zippered door can be closed, rolled open or tied out as an awning. Nylon fabric offers waterproofness and excellent UV protection thanks to a dual coating: silicone on the outside, polyurethane on the inside. The Sierra Designs Origami 3 Tarp Comes with stakes, guylines, tighteners and stuff sacks.
short_description: The 3-season, 3-person Origami 3 Tarp from Sierra Designs fills every niche, from a full-coverage backpacking shelter in the wilderness to an airy sunshade at the beach.
